00031 #ifdef COMPILE_CRYPT_SUPPORT
00032 
00033         #include "KviCryptEngine.h"
00034         #include "Rijndael.h"
00035 
00036         class KviRijndaelEngine : public KviCryptEngine
00037         {
00038                 Q_OBJECT
00039         public:
00040                 KviRijndaelEngine();
00041                 virtual ~KviRijndaelEngine();
00042         private:
00043                 enum OperationalMode {
00044                         OldCBC   =  1,  
00045                         CBC      =  2,  
00046                         ECB      =  3   
00047                 };
00048                 Rijndael * m_pEncryptCipher;
00049                 Rijndael * m_pDecryptCipher;
00050                 OperationalMode m_bEncryptMode;
00051                 OperationalMode m_bDecryptMode;
00052         public:
00053                 virtual bool init(const char *encKey,int encKeyLen,const char *decKey,int decKeyLen);
00054                 virtual KviCryptEngine::EncryptResult encrypt(const char * plainText,KviCString &outBuffer);
00055                 virtual KviCryptEngine::DecryptResult decrypt(const char * inBuffer,KviCString &plainText);
00056         protected:
00057                 virtual bool binaryToAscii(const char *,int,KviCString &){ return false; };
00058                 virtual bool asciiToBinary(const char *,int *,char **){ return false; };
00059                 virtual int getKeyLen(){ return 32; };
00060                 virtual Rijndael::KeyLength getKeyLenId(){ return Rijndael::Key32Bytes; };
00061         private:
00062                 void setLastErrorFromRijndaelErrorCode(int errCode);
00063         };
00064 
00065         class KviRijndaelHexEngine : public KviRijndaelEngine
00066         {
00067                 Q_OBJECT
00068         public:
00069                 KviRijndaelHexEngine() : KviRijndaelEngine() {};
00070                 virtual ~KviRijndaelHexEngine(){};
00071         protected:
00072                 virtual bool binaryToAscii(const char * inBuffer,int len,KviCString &outBuffer);
00073                 virtual bool asciiToBinary(const char * inBuffer,int * len,char ** outBuffer);
00074         };

00155         class KviMircryptionEngine : public KviCryptEngine
00156         {
00157                 Q_OBJECT
00158         public:
00159                 KviMircryptionEngine();
00160                 ~KviMircryptionEngine();
00161         protected:
00162                 KviCString m_szEncryptKey;
00163                 bool m_bEncryptCBC;
00164                 KviCString m_szDecryptKey;
00165                 bool m_bDecryptCBC;
00166         public:
00167                 virtual bool isCryptographicEngine(){ return false; }; // we need to return false since it doesn't use the Qt::CTRL+P escape
00168                 virtual bool init(const char *encKey,int encKeyLen,const char *decKey,int decKeyLen);
00169                 virtual KviCryptEngine::EncryptResult encrypt(const char * plainText,KviCString &outBuffer);
00170                 virtual KviCryptEngine::DecryptResult decrypt(const char * inBuffer,KviCString &plainText);
00171         protected:
00172                 bool doDecryptECB(KviCString &encoded,KviCString &plain);
00173                 bool doDecryptCBC(KviCString &encoded,KviCString &plain);
00174                 bool doEncryptECB(KviCString &plain,KviCString &encoded);
00175                 bool doEncryptCBC(KviCString &plain,KviCString &encoded);
00176         };
